entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:54 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: NNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
